approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the VKYC team has to request the IT data server team to provide recordings. The recordings are stored on an NFS server. This process is manual and time-consuming.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to VKYC team leads and Process Managers.
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be searchable by date and month.
Users should be able to download recordings.
An option to upload a file (Excel or text) with LAN IDs should be available for bulk download.
The system should process the uploaded file and trigger a backend API call.
The results of the bulk download request should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should display a maximum of 10 records per page.
A maximum of 10 records should be downloaded at a time.
The file upload should accept csv/txt files.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Search functionality by date and month.
Bulk download functionality via file upload.
Display of results in a tabular format.
Pagination for search results and downloads.
File upload (CSV/TXT) for bulk LAN ID input.
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads).
The system should be secure to protect sensitive video recordings.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The bulk download functionality works as expected.
The system meets audit requirements for accessing recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF NFS server.
Limited access to the portal (Team Leads only).
assumptions: The NFS server is accessible and functional.
The necessary APIs for accessing and downloading recordings are available.
The file format for bulk upload (CSV/TXT) is known and consistent.
risks: Network issues affecting access to the NFS server.
Data security breaches due to unauthorized access.
Performance issues with bulk download functionality.
Compatibility issues with file upload formats.

recommendations: Include specific performance requirements (e.g., download speed).
Define the security measures in more detail.
Specify the error handling and logging requirements.

identified_gaps: Error handling and logging requirements are not defined.
recommendations_for_completion: Define specific security measures (e.g., encryption, access controls).
Specify performance metrics (e.g., download time, response time).
Detail the error handling and logging mechanisms.
